inicio.titulo: Pneumatic waste collection for more humane and sustainable cities.

CITIES
HOSPITALS

aeropuertos.titulo: How will the future airport look like?

botones.texto: MORE SECURE
WITH IMPROVED LOGISTICS AND OPERATIONS
MORE SUSTAINABLE

texto: Less waste handling = less risk.
Reduction of vehicles in the air and ground zones.
The waste entry points can be designed to restrict the type of waste and have crushers to destroy illegal materials.
Waste collection from all points of the airport.
Centralized waste management â€“ Central collection (no intermediate storage).
Reduction of vehicles in the air and ground zones. Saves time and improves staff efficiency.
The system works 24/7 in any weather condition.
No manual collection. Better resource allocation through automation and predictive analysis.
No overflowing containers. Improves passenger experience.
Greater control over waste classification and the use carried out by retailers.
Optimized waste collection.
Improved recycling rates.
Reduction of carbon footprint.
Reduction of CO2 emissions.

botones.texto: MORE TRAFFIC AND LESS SECURITY WHEN VEHICLES ARE ON THE RUNWAY.
A SIGNIFICANT AMOUNT OF SPACE OCCUPIED BY INTERMEDIATE STORAGE POINTS.
OVERFLOWING CONTAINERS THAT POLLUTE THE APPEARANCE OF THE AIRPORT.
MORE COMPLEX COLLECTION ROUTINES.
LESS SECURITY DUE TO RESIDUES AND/OR DANGEROUS MATERIALS DEPOSITED IN THE TRASH.
LESS FRIENDLY ENVIRONMENT AND DAMAGED REPUTATION.
MORE SECURITY WHEN REDUCING TRAFFIC AND MANIPULATION ON THE RUNWAY.
MORE SPACE IN THE AIRPORT FOR EMBARKATION, RESTAURATION AND OTHERS.
ELIMINATION OF WASTE STORAGE IN TRASH OR TRANSIT POINTS.
CENTRALIZED WASTE COLLECTION. UNINTERRUPTED AND OPTIMIZED OPERATION REDUCING OPERATING COSTS.
MORE SECURITY. LESS WASTE MANIPULATION AND RISK OF DANGEROUS MATERIALS.
IMPROVED PASSENGER EXPERIENCE AND BETTER AIRPORT APPEARANCE.

ciudades.titulo: How will the future city look like?

botones.texto: MORE COMFORTABLE AND CLEAN CITIES
MORE SUSTAINABLE CITIES
MORE SECURE CITIES
MORE HUMAN CITIES
MORE EFFICIENT CITIES

texto: More ordered and free of nuisances, which improves the satisfaction and quality of life of citizens.
Waste disposal points available 24/7, every day of the year.
No overflowing containers. Cleaner streets.
Less traffic of collection vehicles, bad smells or noise.
Better waste separation and recycling rates.
Thanks to the use of AI, municipalities can access data about the use of the system, optimizing their management and improving service efficiency.
Reduction of heavy vehicle traffic. In a city type, the distance driven by this type of vehicle is reduced from 2828 km to 208 km per year.
Reduction of gases. In a city type, emissions are reduced by 95%.
More pedestrian zones and green spaces.
Less risk of accidents for citizens and workers.
Optimized mobility in urban areas.
More relaxed environment.
Less vandalism by removing street containers.
Reduction of public space occupied.
More pedestrian zones and green spaces.
More space for parking or dumpsters in urbanizations.
Envac dumpsters and gates integrate perfectly into urban design.
Modern and sustainable infrastructure that improves the quality of life of citizens.
Cost savings in operation and maintenance costs by minimizing the need for personnel to manage waste.

The system's lifecycle cost is lower compared to traditional collection. Additionally, its efficiency allows for a return on investment in less than 10 years in many projects, making it an economically sustainable solution in the long term.

botones.texto: MORE DIRTY CITIES, WITH OVERFLOWING CONTAINERS.
CITIES WITH MUCH ACUSTIC AND ENVIRONMENTAL POLLUTION.
MORE TRAFFIC AND LESS ROAD AND PEDESTRIAN SAFETY.
COMMON AREAS ARE DARK AND UNUSABLE.
NEED FOR SPACES FOR WASTE STORAGE IN BUILDINGS.
MUCH PUBLIC SPACE OCCUPIED.
DEPENDENCY ON HOURS AND ROUTINES OF WASTE COLLECTION.
MORE CLEAN CITIES, WITHOUT OVERFLOWING CONTAINERS.
MORE CLEAN CITIES. REDUCTION OF NOISE AND EMISSIONS BY UP TO 95%.
REDUCED COLLECTION ROUTES BY 92%. MORE ROAD AND PEDESTRIAN SAFETY.
COMMON AREAS ARE BETTER UTILIZED AND MORE GREEN SPACES.
AVAILABLE SPACE FOR COMMERCE AND COMMON AREAS IN BUILDINGS.
PUBLIC SPACE AVAILABLE FOR PARKING AND OTHER USES.
BUZONES AND GATES AVAILABLE 24/7 â€“ BETTER QUALITY OF LIFE, USERS MORE CONTENT.

hospitales.titulo: How would a cleaner, safer and more efficient hospital look like?

botones.texto: IMPROVED SECURITY FOR PATIENTS AND PERSONNEL
OPTIMIZED WORK ENVIRONMENT
IMPROVED OPERATIONS AND PROFITABILITY
EFFICIENCY AND PRODUCTIVITY IMPROVED
BETTER HOSPITAL IMAGE AND REPUTATION

popUps.titulo: IMPROVED SECURITY FOR PATIENTS AND PERSONNEL
texto: The waste, general and infectious, travels through a sealed underground pipe network.
The waste is not transported through corridors and elevators.
Reduction of exposure to pathogens, improving hygiene and minimizing risks for patients and families. No cross-contamination.
Infectious waste is directly converted into non-dangerous waste at the hospital collection center.
Practically eliminated heavy manual and dangerous labor.
Greater security and hygiene, implying lower personnel rotation and fewer medical errors.
Fewer human errors.
Improves all hospital logistics.
Less noise and odors.
No depends on labor. Resource optimization and cost reduction.
The medical service is not interrupted by cleaning routines (clean zones).
Reduction of infrastructure and pavement wear and tear by not transporting waste through corridors and elevators.
As an automated system, human errors are reduced, which implies lower cost derived from the same and a quick return on investment.
The automated system works 24/7.
It adapts to demand and extraordinary situations where it is necessary to collect more waste or more frequently.
Saves space â€“ No need for elevators.
The incorporation of advanced technology as Envac reinforces the hospital's reputation.
Eliminates the antiesthetic manual waste and clothing transfer throughout the hospital, providing patients and visitors a better experience.
A cleaner, more organized and hygienic environment attracts both patients and healthcare professionals, generating a positive and differentiated impression.

botones.texto: MORE SPACE NEEDED FOR STORAGE INSIDE THE HOSPITAL.
MORE ELEVATORS OR WITH GREATER CAPACITY.
MORE COMPLICATED CIRCULATION OF PATIENTS AND PERSONNEL, AL CONVIVING WITH Carts OR AGVs BY PASILLOS.
LOWER SECURITY: CROSS CONTAMINATION RISK.
MORE COMPLEX CLEANING ROUTINES.
LESS ARCHITECTURAL FREEDOM AND SPACE AVAILABLE.
LOWER SECURITY: MORE HUMAN RISKS AND COMPLICATED WORK ENVIRONMENT.
WORSE HOSPITAL IMAGE AND REPUTATION.
NO LOCAL OR INTERMEDIATE STORAGE.
ELEVATOR CAPACITY LIBERATED AND LOGISTICS IMPROVED.
AGILE AND SAFE CIRCULATION OF PATIENTS AND PERSONNEL.
HERMETIC TRANSPORT MORE HYGIENIC AND SAFE: NO CROSS CONTAMINATION RISK.
AUTOMATED SYSTEM, OPTIMIZED CLEANING ROUTINES.
MORE ARCHITECTURAL FREEDOM AND MORE SPACE FOR BEDROOMS AND HEALTH SERVICES.
BETTER SECURITY: GATES WITH ACCESS CONTROL. IMPROVED WORK ENVIRONMENT.
BETTER HOSPITAL IMAGE AND REPUTATION.
